sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/MISC.s 4 and 6).

The IPCC highlighted work on the AR5 and informed parties that the InterAcademy Council would finalize in August, a report on IPCC processes and procedures in order to ensure an accountable and transparent process.
THAILAND and TAJIKISTAN emphasized the need to build research capacity.
The EU stressed the importance of science in guiding the negotiating process.
Sergio Castellari (Italy) and David Lesolle (Botswana) will conduct informal consultations.
